content.raw:
Hello, I'm running gazebo on a mac running OSX 10.10 Yosemite. I have repeatedly installed (via homebrew) and uninstalled (using Terminal command: brew uninstall gazebo6) trying to fix this error, but Gazebo keeps instantly crashing every time I open it. I've decided to post here as a last resort. Most of the time I face an error, I'm able to find someone who has experienced this problem before and posted about it, but not this time. It seems that others have been dealing with this, but I have yet to find a solution online. Every time gazebo crashes, it crashes with this error:

~~~
libpng warning: iCCP: known incorrect sRGB profile
libpng warning: iCCP: known incorrect sRGB profile
libpng warning: iCCP: known incorrect sRGB profile
libpng warning: iCCP: known incorrect sRGB profile
libpng warning: iCCP: known incorrect sRGB profile
libpng warning: iCCP: known incorrect sRGB profile
libpng warning: iCCP: known incorrect sRGB profile
libpng warning: iCCP: known incorrect sRGB profile
libpng warning: iCCP: known incorrect sRGB profile
libpng warning: iCCP: known incorrect sRGB profile
libpng warning: iCCP: known incorrect sRGB profile
libpng warning: iCCP: known incorrect sRGB profile
Qt has caught an exception thrown from an event handler. Throwing
exceptions from an event handler is not supported in Qt. You must
reimplement QApplication::notify() and catch all exceptions there.

libc++abi.dylib: terminating with uncaught exception of type Ogre::ItemIdentityException: OGRE EXCEPTION(5:ItemIdentityException): Can not find codec for 'png' image format.
Supported formats are: dds. in Codec::getCodec at /tmp/ogre20150917-15658-110uuve/ogre_src_v1-7-4/OgreMain/src/OgreCodec.cpp (line 69)
~~~

Thanks a lot in advance, and let me know how I can help clarify the issue any further.
content.html:
Hello, I'm running gazebo on a mac running OSX 10.10 Yosemite. I have repeatedly installed (via homebrew) and uninstalled (using Terminal command: brew uninstall gazebo6) trying to fix this error, but Gazebo keeps instantly crashing every time I open it. I've decided to post here as a last resort. Most of the time I face an error, I'm able to find someone who has experienced this problem before and posted about it, but not this time. It seems that others have been dealing with this, but I have yet to find a solution online. Every time gazebo crashes, it crashes with this error:

libpng warning: iCCP: known incorrect sRGB profile
libpng warning: iCCP: known incorrect sRGB profile
libpng warning: iCCP: known incorrect sRGB profile
libpng warning: iCCP: known incorrect sRGB profile
libpng warning: iCCP: known incorrect sRGB profile
libpng warning: iCCP: known incorrect sRGB profile
libpng warning: iCCP: known incorrect sRGB profile
libpng warning: iCCP: known incorrect sRGB profile
libpng warning: iCCP: known incorrect sRGB profile
libpng warning: iCCP: known incorrect sRGB profile
libpng warning: iCCP: known incorrect sRGB profile
libpng warning: iCCP: known incorrect sRGB profile
Qt has caught an exception thrown from an event handler. Throwing
exceptions from an event handler is not supported in Qt. You must
reimplement QApplication::notify() and catch all exceptions there.

libc++abi.dylib: terminating with uncaught exception of type Ogre::ItemIdentityException: OGRE EXCEPTION(5:ItemIdentityException): Can not find codec for 'png' image format.
Supported formats are: dds. in Codec::getCodec at /tmp/ogre20150917-15658-110uuve/ogre_src_v1-7-4/OgreMain/src/OgreCodec.cpp (line 69)

Thanks a lot in advance, and let me know how I can help clarify the issue any further.
